hierarchy.name: Production
hierarchy.description: Features related to manufactured product volumes, production behavior, and product-level variability.

children.name: Temporal (Lag) Features
children.description: Lagged production observations and composite lag indicators.

children.name: Rolling Statistics
children.description: Rolling-window summary statistics computed on production time series.

children.name: Rolling Std
children.description: Rolling standard deviation features with optional lag offsets.

children.name: Rolling Max
children.description: Rolling maximum features (including small-window max with lags).

children.name: Derived Product Variability
children.description: Product-level daily variability statistics and their lags.

children.name: Associated Metrics (Demand Signals)
children.description: Related demand/sales signals often used alongside production features.

hierarchy.name: Factory_Issue
hierarchy.description: Indicators of factory-level problems or disruptions and their temporal/aggregate summaries.

children.name: Temporal (Lag) Features
children.description: Lagged factory issue indicators (single and composite lags).

children.name: Rolling Statistics
children.description: Rolling summary statistics of factory issue signals.

children.name: Rolling Max
children.description: Rolling maximums and their lagged variants.

children.name: Rolling Min
children.description: Rolling minimums over windows and lagged versions.

hierarchy.name: Delivery
hierarchy.description: Features describing deliveries, logistics timing (lags) and rolling delivery metrics.

children.name: Temporal (Lag) Features
children.description: Lagged delivery metrics and multi-lag features.

children.name: Rolling Statistics
children.description: Rolling window delivery summary measures (min/max) with lagged variants.

children.name: Rolling Max
children.description: Rolling maximum delivery values and lagged versions.

children.name: Rolling Min
children.description: Rolling minimums (e.g., 7-day minima) and their lags.

hierarchy.name: Group
hierarchy.description: Higher-level grouping of products or product categories. Contains group-level SOS/product signals.

children.name: SOS Signals
children.description: Sub-group level SOS indicators and their lags.

hierarchy.name: holiday_type
hierarchy.description: Categorical type of holiday (no derived features present in list).

hierarchy.name: holiday_name
hierarchy.description: Specific holiday name identifiers (no derived features present in list).

hierarchy.name: Rainfall
hierarchy.description: Rainfall-related environmental features (no derived features present in list).

hierarchy.name: Sunshine
hierarchy.description: Sunshine / solar exposure environmental features (no derived features present in list).

hierarchy.name: Humidity
hierarchy.description: Humidity features (no derived features present in list).

hierarchy.name: Temperature
hierarchy.description: Temperature features (no derived features present in list).

hierarchy.name: category
hierarchy.description: Generic categorical grouping attribute (no derived features present in list).

hierarchy.name: scope_or_location
hierarchy.description: Geographic or scope identifier features (no derived features present in list).

hierarchy.name: typical_rain_mm
hierarchy.description: Typical rainfall amount (no derived features present in list).

hierarchy.name: BDT_USD
hierarchy.description: Currency conversion or monetary indicator (no derived features present in list).
